commiss regul eec april lai addit provis grant export refund fisheri product commiss european commun regard treati establish european econom commun regard council regul eec januari common organ market fisheri product amend regul eec regard council regul eec januari lai gener rule grant export refund fisheri product criteria fix amount refund articl thereof found product commun origin frozen process board vessel fly flag member countri product export frozen process econom condit oper carri compar oper carri member countri product cost substanti lower commun grant export refund product frozen process condit product unjustifi econom advantag measur provid regul accord opinion manag committe fisheri product adopt regul articl purpos export refund system fisheri product commun origin frozen process board vessel regist record countri fly flag countri consid product commun origin articl regul enter forc april appli export custom export formal complet effect date regul bind entireti directli applic member state brussel april commiss finn gundelach vice presid oj oj oj
